title: Michelle Keegan looks radiant in a palm print bikini as she shares snaps from holiday in Dubai
text:
She's spent the past few months hard at work filming for season five of Our Girl and comedy drama, Brassic.

So Michelle Keegan treated herself to a well earned holiday as she shared photographs from her getaway in sunny Dubai on Monday.

The actress, 32, posted an image of herself in a black and green bikini with a leaf design, that she captioned, 'just missing a Mojito'.

Fun in the sun: Michelle Keegan treated herself to a well earned holiday as she shared photographs from her getaway in sunny Dubai on Monday

She wrapped a matching cover up around one shoulder as she lounged on a sandy beach while clutching a sun shading straw hat in one hand.

Her brunette tresses were left to naturally fall down her back and she wore no makeup as she grinned for the camera.

In another post the former Coronation Street star posed in front of a brightly lit building as she showed off clothes from her new Very collection.

She captioned the image: 'Obviously I had to pack some of my favourite VeryUK pieces!'

Michelle wore a beige wide-legged trouser suit with a black sweetheart shaped top in the snap. For accessories she added golden hooped earrings.

Chic: In another post the former Coronation Street star posed in front of a brightly lit building as she showed off clothes from her new Very collection

The holiday comes after Michelle revealed that her mother is putting pressure on her to start a family with her husband Mark Wright.

The actress, who married Mark in 2015, joked she is 'not getting any younger' but was not yet ready to start a family during an interview on The Jonathan Ross Show.

When asked if babies are on the horizon, Michelle told the host: 'Not yet. Everyone always asks that question. Don't get me wrong, I'm not getting any younger. My mum is on it as well. No plans yet, but we definitely do want children in the future.'

She also spoke about how they managed to make their marriage work, while they had to live in different countries due to their careers.

'He got the job in LA while I was in Malaysia [filming Our Girl],' she said. 'We were apart for about 4 months. It was really tough...

'People said how did you deal with it and stuff. Thank god for FaceTime and things like that. You're on a countdown the whole time to just get home.'
description: Michelle Keegan, 32, shared an image of herself in a black and green bikini with a leaf design. She captioned it 'just missing a Mojito'. The actress is currently on holiday in Dubai.
